name: Tecto Slider
description:
Tecto Slider is a 3D puzzle game with educational purposes. The goal is to find misplaced continents, islands, or fragments and slide them back to their proper locations as fast as possible.

The game contains a mini-puzzle pack with puzzles varying from simple to more challenging. There is also one additional Super Puzzle with great replay value, in which all continents are broken and randomly scattered, and your job is to rebuild the entire Earth.

Besides PCs, there is also a free version available for mobile devices.
